description: In order for BGInfo to use a BGI configuration file instead of the default configuration (which is stored in the registry), the name of the file must be specified in the command line. I.e. " BGInfo MyConfig.bgi ".
More information about BgInfo is available on Microsoft's TechNet BgInfo page.
BgInfo was originally developed by Sysinternals, which was acquired by Microsoft in July, 2006.

common_filenames.description: MyConfig.bgi - the standard BGI configuration filename
